itunes:title: Snorting Line Of Hot Cheetos (Matt King)
title: Snorting Line Of Hot Cheetos (Matt King)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Matt King is fellow podcaster, Internet personality, and friend. He shares the time he used bleach instead of eye drops by accident, his wildest college party, and when an NFL player bought him a drink thinking he was someone else. Plus we have a hot Cheeto wager.


Check out matt on instagram @mattrking

Check out Matt's Podcasts: Hoot & A Half; Unfiltered with Zane and Heath

Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod
